column4: OKAY guys I have the terminal open  and I typed in sudo/etc/init.d/?dm restart and got error
sudo/etc/init.d/?dm: No such file or directory
Ok thank like I said this is my first time on linux system
ok what I want to do Is change my 800x600 top something bigger  all it gives me is 800x600 or lower
what kind of video card do you have?
open System>Admin>Synaptic package manager and search for voodo and see if there is a driver listed that's available.. then install if it's not already installed.
